text: @StephenCurry30 @NIAIDNews Awesome! You have talked about the importance of flattening the curve b4 we slowly & methodically re-open the country. My question is, for me (stage IV lung cancer) & my community, when is it safe for us to re-enter? We will always be at ⬆️ risk for severe COVID19.  #SCASKSFAUCI
